name: Brick Dodger (ChickenStripsDev)
description: This game is about trying to live as long as you can to beat the Dev's high score of "69420 score". This is still a prototype and will most likely get a few updates adding in features such as a permanent high score,  bug fixes, UI redesigns, and optimizations so it can run better. I hope some of you enjoy the game even though it is relatively simple! I am working on a more "fun"  full game. if you have questions or recommendations PLEASE COMMENT and I will hopefully respond. Thank You For Even Reading This!
